name: Battlerager
description: Dwarven warriors who hurl themselves into battle clad in spiked armor.

3.name: Restrictionâ€”Dwarves Only
3.description: Only dwarves can choose this path, though a DM may lift this restriction to suit the campaign.

3.name: Battlerager Armor
3.description: While wearing spiked armor and raging, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack for 1d4 piercing damage and deal 3 piercing damage when you successfully grapple.

6.name: Reckless Abandon
6.description: When you use Reckless Attack while raging, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

10.name: Battlerager Charge
10.description: You can take the Dash action as a bonus action while you are raging.

14.name: Spiked Retribution
14.description: While raging in spiked armor, a creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 3 piercing damage if it is within 5 feet of you.
